articles.content: The COVID pandemic has introduced many scientific and medical terms into our everyday language. Many of us are now fluent in conversations about viral strains, PCR tests and mortality rates. Brain fo… [+6565 chars]

articles.author: Dr Jayashree Nagaraj Bhasgi
articles.title: Menopause: How to prepare your body for it - Health shots
articles.description: Menopause is an important transitional phase for a woman and so it is important to know how to prepare for menopause.
articles.content: Menopause is a Greek word ‘mens’, which means monthly and pause, meaning cessation. So, its the end of menstruation and reproductive life due to loss of ovarian activity and is a natural ageing proce… [+4270 chars]
